text:
Mayflower MRT station (TE6) is a future underground Mass Rapid Transit station on the Thomson-East Coast Line in Ang Mo Kio, Singapore. It will be located around Kebun Baru Heights Estate, Kebun Baru Community Centre (CC) and near CHIJ St Nicholas Girls' School.
History.
This station was first announced on 29 August 2012. It will have the most number of exits along the Thomson-East Coast Line, with seven, making it the most accessible.
